Package gw.bizrules.management

Interface RuleQueryFactory<R extends Rule>

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
public interface RuleQueryFactory<R extends Rule> extends Serializable

  • Method Details

    • getDisplayName

      String getDisplayName()
      The name to be displayed in the UI for this query
      Returns:
      Display name for query

    • createQuery

      @Deprecated Query<RuleVersion> createQuery(BizRulesVersionController controller, FilterCriteria<R> ruleCriteria, FilterCriteria<RuleVersion> ruleVersionCriteria)
      Deprecated.
      As of 10.0.0 Use createVersionQuery(FilterCriteria) instead.
      Generates the query, applying the passed in filters if provided. The returned query should respect the current deployment setting if appropriate.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main controller for BizRules
      ruleCriteria - Vertical filter for the type of rule to match, e.g. which triggering key. Used by the executor to identify which rules apply at a given triggering point.
      ruleVersionCriteria - Horizontal filter for a general rule attribute, such as availableToRun Used by the RulesList UI to apply applicability criteria
      Returns:
      The generated query

    • createVersionQuery

      Query<RuleVersion> createVersionQuery(FilterCriteria<R> ruleCriteria)
      Generates a RuleVersion query applying the specified filter if provided. The query will respect the current deployment setting. There is no requirement that the associated Rule is included as a join; it may use a sub-select instead. However, it must select the same versions as createRuleQuery(FilterCriteria).
      Parameters:
      ruleCriteria - Filter that specifies filtering restrictions on the Rule (subtype) associated with the RuleVersion, e.g., the triggering key or whether available to run. Used by the executor to identify the the rules that apply at a given triggering point. Used by the RulesList UI to apply applicability criteria
      Returns:
      The generated RuleVersion query.

    • createRuleQuery

      Query<R> createRuleQuery(FilterCriteria<R> ruleCriteria)
      Generates a Rule query applying the specified filter if provided. The query will respect the current deployment setting. The query must include the RuleVersion associated with the Rule using a reverse-join through the "Rule" link.

      The joined versions are identical to those selected by createVersionQuery(FilterCriteria).

      Parameters:
      ruleCriteria - Filter that specifies filtering restrictions on the Rule (subtype) , e.g., the triggering key or whether available to run. Used by the executor to identify the the rules that apply at a given triggering point. Used by the RulesList UI to support some sorting and application applicability criteria
      Returns:
      The generated Rule query.
